name: Tony Yike Yang celebrates Lunar New Year

location.name: Koerner Hall, Royal Conservatory of Music

description:
Hailed by CBC Music as one of Canada's finest young musicians, pianist Tony Yike Yang first rose to international acclaim at the age of 16 after becoming the youngest-ever Laureate in the history of the International Chopin Piano Competition in Warsaw, winning the 5th prize in 2015. 

An alumnus of The Taylor Academy, he has also performed for dozens of royalty, dignitaries, and ambassadors such as HRH Camilla, the Queen Consort of the United Kingdom, HRH Queen Mathilde of Belgium, former Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper, former Kuwaiti Prime Minister Sheikh Nasser Al-Sabah, and Polish President Andrzej Duda, among others.

The Chopin Courier notes he is "…an absolute revelation…he combines the characteristics of a true virtuoso and an artist." 

Please join us! This concert is preceded by a short performance by talented students of The Royal Conservatory.

name: Four Centuries - Berlin, Montréal, TO
description:
Expect a wonderfully varied program as Music Director Nurhan Arman leads the ensemble and two virtuoso guest artists in the orchestra's first concert of 2026. 

A cheerful Mozart Divertimento will open for the new Fantasia 'Conjure You' by Toronto composer/producer David Jaeger. The brilliant Quebec cellist Noémie Raymond will play one of the best-loved works for her instrument, the Saint-Saëns Cello Concerto No. 1. Berlin Philharmonic oboist Cristoph Hartmann will appear in two beautiful works, a new concerto by Toronto composer Norbert Palej and JS Bach's Oboe Concerto in D minor.

name: Shuffle Demons and Funk Yo Self
description:
Join us for an explosive evening with Toronto legends the Shuffle Demons and Montréal guest Tariq Amery!

An electrifying night of boundary-pushing jazz, funk, and global grooves featuring two dynamic forces of the Canadian music scene.

Funk Yo Self is a high energy and sophisticated party-band sensation hailing from the Outaouais region. Funk Yo Self keeps fans reeling with their unique blend of psychedelic, funk and jazz fusion.

Sharing the bill are the legendary Shuffle Demons, a genre bending, highly visually entertaining, jazz/funk band with an electrifying musical fusion that draws from Sun Ra, Charles Mingus, Run DMC and the Beastie Boys. Expect exciting, no holds barred performances that feature wild romps in the crowd, free jazz moments, danceable funk, poetry, killer solos and more. Shuffle Demons are a perfect festival, theatre or club act.
